On 12.05.2010 14:04, Robert Wilson wrote:
> 
> 
> 
> Two thoughts:
> 
> 1. This could be seen as a PATCH 
> (http://tools.ietf.org/html/draft-dusseault-http-patch-16) to the 
> collection
> http://myserver.com/service/items <http://myserver.com/service/items>
> with a patch media type describing the representation of the difference.
> This has the advantage that the entity in the caches will be treated as 
> stale
> ...

Now RFC 5789.

Best regards, Julian
